languages.text: "Даже если бы я хотел откупиться, мы лишились богатств Крудараха, когда лишились самого мира-корабля. И все же торговаться за жизнь с мон-кай? Я лучше навсегда сгину во тьме".

traits.locale_text: "Даже если бы я хотел откупиться, мы лишились богатств Крудараха, когда лишились самого мира-корабля. И все же торговаться за жизнь с мон-кай? Я лучше навсегда сгину во тьме".
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Even if I wanted to pay you off, we lost the wealth of Crudarach along with the craftworld itself. Bargain for my life with a mon-keigh? I would rather go into the eternal night."
languages.original_text: "Даже если бы я хотел откупиться, мы лишились богатств Крудараха, когда лишились самого мира-корабля. И все же торговаться за жизнь с мон-кай? Я лучше навсегда сгину во тьме".

traits.locale_text: "Even if I wanted to pay you off, we lost the wealth of Crudarach along with the Craftworld itself. Bargain for my life with a mon-keigh? I would rather go into the eternal night."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "Even if I wanted to pay you off, we lost the wealth of Crudarach along with the Craftworld itself. Bargain for my life with a mon-keigh? I would rather go into the eternal night."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "Even if I wanted to pay you off, we lost the wealth of Crudarach along with the Craftworld itself. Bargain for my life with a mon-keigh? I would rather go into the eternal night."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "Even if I wanted to pay you off, we lost the wealth of Crudarach along with the Craftworld itself. Bargain for my life with a mon-keigh? I would rather go into the eternal night."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "Even if I wanted to pay you off, we lost the wealth of Crudarach along with the craftworld itself. Bargain for my life with a mon-keigh? I would rather go into the eternal night."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "Even if I wanted to pay you off, we lost the wealth of Crudarach along with the craftworld itself. Bargain for my life with a mon-keigh? I would rather go into the eternal night."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: «Aun cuando tuviese intención de compensaros, la fortuna de Crudarach se perdió junto con el propio mundo astronave. ¿Y negociar por mi vida con un mon-keigh? Antes me pierdo en la noche eterna».
languages.original_text: "Even if I wanted to pay you off, we lost the wealth of Crudarach along with the craftworld itself. Bargain for my life with a mon-keigh? I would rather go into the eternal night."

traits.locale_text: «Aun cuando tuviese intención de compensaros, la fortuna de Crudarach se perdió junto con el propio mundo astronave. ¿Y negociar por mi vida con un mon-keigh? Antes me pierdo en la noche eterna».
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: “我们已经失去了克鲁达拉赫的财富和方舟世界本身，即便我愿意进行物质赔偿，恐怕也做不到。至于拿我的命来换猴子的原谅？那我还不如坠入永夜。”
languages.original_text: "Even if I wanted to pay you off, we lost the wealth of Crudarach along with the craftworld itself. Bargain for my life with a mon-keigh? I would rather go into the eternal night."

traits.locale_text: “我们已经失去了克鲁达拉赫的财富和方舟世界本身，即便我愿意进行物质赔偿，恐怕也做不到。至于拿我的命来换猴子的原谅？那我还不如坠入永夜。”
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: « Même si je voulais vous dédommager, nous avons perdu les trésors de Crudarach en même temps que notre vaisseau-monde. De toute manière, je préférerais plonger dans la nuit éternelle plutôt que de marchander ma survie avec un mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: "Even if I wanted to pay you off, we lost the wealth of Crudarach along with the craftworld itself. Bargain for my life with a mon-keigh? I would rather go into the eternal night."

traits.locale_text: « Même si je voulais vous dédommager, nous avons perdu les trésors de Crudarach en même temps que notre vaisseau-monde. De toute manière, je préférerais plonger dans la nuit éternelle plutôt que de marchander ma survie avec un mon-keigh. »
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: 「たとえ私がお前に金を払おうと思っても、我々は方舟そのものとともにクルダラの富を失った。モン＝ケイのために私の命を賭けろと？ならば、永遠の夜のほうがマシだ」
languages.original_text: "Even if I wanted to pay you off, we lost the wealth of Crudarach along with the craftworld itself. Bargain for my life with a mon-keigh? I would rather go into the eternal night."

traits.locale_text: 「たとえ私がお前に金を払おうと思っても、我々は方舟そのものとともにクルダラの富を失った。モン＝ケイのために私の命を賭けろと？ならば、永遠の夜のほうがマシだ」
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Selbst, wenn ich Euch bezahlen würde, wir haben den Reichtum von Crudarach zusammen mit dem Weltenschiff selbst verloren. Mit einem Chem-Pan-Sey um mein Leben feilschen? Da gehe ich lieber in die ewige Nacht."
languages.original_text: "Even if I wanted to pay you off, we lost the wealth of Crudarach along with the craftworld itself. Bargain for my life with a mon-keigh? I would rather go into the eternal night."

traits.locale_text: "Selbst, wenn ich Euch bezahlen würde, wir haben den Reichtum von Crudarach zusammen mit dem Weltenschiff selbst verloren. Mit einem Chem-Pan-Sey um mein Leben feilschen? Da gehe ich lieber in die ewige Nacht."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Sana ödeme yapmak istesem de gemidünyamızla birlikte Crudarach'ın tüm servetini kaybettik. Bir mon-keigh ile canımın pazarlığını mı yapmamı istiyorsun? Ebedî gecenin yolunu tutmayı yeğlerim."
languages.original_text: "Even if I wanted to pay you off, we lost the wealth of Crudarach along with the craftworld itself. Bargain for my life with a mon-keigh? I would rather go into the eternal night."

traits.locale_text: "Sana ödeme yapmak istesem de gemidünyamızla birlikte Crudarach'ın tüm servetini de kaybettik. Bir mon-keigh ile canımın pazarlığını mı yapmamı istiyorsun? Ebedî gecenin yolunu tutmayı yeğlerim."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader
